name: concrete-template
description: A simple template for projects using the Concrete framework
author: The concrete-geth authors

scripts.concrete:link:sibling: go list -m -json github.com/ethereum/go-ethereum | jq -r '.Replace.Version' > .version && ABS_PATH=$(realpath ../concrete-geth) && go mod edit -replace github.com/ethereum/go-ethereum=$ABS_PATH && go mod tidy
scripts.concrete:unlink: VERSION=$(cat .version) && go mod edit -replace github.com/ethereum/go-ethereum=github.com/concrete-eth/concrete-geth@$VERSION && go mod tidy
